column1: Uchi////We've had the opportunity to travel to Houston for a couple weddings & Uchi came highly recommended from one of our brides. I'm glad we took her recommendation. Though
column2: if you don't make reservations -- you're going to wait. For a long
column3: long time. (Don't let this discourage you. You'll forget the wait as soon as you get your food.) And if you're impatient like me
column4: head over to the coffee shop next door and get a beer.
